Section.Catchline: Authority of Department of Law Enforcement to accept fingerprints of, and exchange criminal history records with respect to, bar applicants.

SectionBody.Text: The Department of Law Enforcement is authorized to accept fingerprints of applicants for admission to The Florida Bar and, to the extent provided for by federal law, to exchange state, multistate, and federal criminal history records with the Florida Board of Bar Examiners for licensing purposes.
